description:
Kdenlive 24.05 open-source video editor brings multi-format rendering, faster clip handling, automatic subtitle translations, and more.

The post Kdenlive 24.05 Debuts with Multi-Format Rendering appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Kdenlive 24.05 Debuts with Multi-Format Rendering

description:
Standard Notes is an open-source and completely encrypted notes app. It offers both free and paid plans and offers both, cloud hosting and the option to host it on your server. This tutorial teaches you how to self-host your standard notes server on a Rocky Linux 9 machine.

The post How to Install Standard Notes Server on Rocky Linux 9 appeared first on Linux Today.
title: How to Install Standard Notes Server on Rocky Linux 9

description:
The GNOME 46.2 desktop environment is out now, featuring enhancements across numerous modules, such as GLib, GNOME Shell, Adwaita icon theme, and more.

The post GNOME 46.2 Released, Here’s What’s New appeared first on Linux Today.
title: GNOME 46.2 Released, Here’s What’s New

description:
Wayland 1.23 display server protocol released, featuring improved debugging aids, new enum-header modes, and OpenBSD support.

The post Wayland 1.23 Released, Here’s What’s New appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Wayland 1.23 Released, Here’s What’s New

description:
Canonical launched a real-time kernel for Ubuntu 24.04 LTS optimized for mission-critical apps but available only to users with a PRO subscription.

The post Ubuntu 24.04 Now Offers a Real-Time Kernel, But There’s a Catch appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Ubuntu 24.04 Now Offers a Real-Time Kernel, But There’s a Catch
